title: How to stop Google from tracking a phone - Quora

response.answer_text: There isn't any risk in this. As Google is a Genuine Site and All our Android Phone in today's world everything is connected to google and even our things are synced with it. If you don't want to share/off the Location service, you can keep the Location Off on your Smartphone. Also in the Google Account, there is separate option for Location History, you can turn off that too. But, I'll recommend keeping your location on because think if tommorow your smartphone gets lost in public areas, You can find your phone remotely and Even you can ring your phone remotely
